examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We are super confused about how Teams work and would like to set up a call with someone to make sure that we have things done properly.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: billing and account set up

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 

I was looking to have a call to set up our accounts and permission correctly?

Is it possible to have a 10 min call with the account management team?

Best wishes,

<NAME>
Describe the issue: Want to make sue our CanvaPro acct is set up properly. Please contact me at <EMAIL>

What do you need help with?: hi, please can i speak to somebody about cleaning my accounts? i keep receiving error messages saying i dont have the permissions t o post, and i think it is because of the mumerous accounts set up.

thankyou

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I am being charged and I can't find where to cancel it. It doesn't show any subscription under account settings. Can you please call it?

Regards

Tiago

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: This account was set up for an organization and the person who's contact information it was set up under is no longer with the organization and it needs to be changed.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have signed up for Canva Pro, I just want to be sure this is all set

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there- -I see bills on my account for canva but I believe I should just have a free service.  This is billing to a credit card that I dont ever use so I need to get rid of that billing information and make sure the account is set properly.  Can we please connect about this.  Thank you so much.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Issues with Team set up

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to cancel my subscription, but it is not showing up in my settings on my phone. I would like this to happen before the billing cycle begins on the 7th.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hey Guys, I need to just speak with someone, a hacker clearly established an account on your server and has used one of my photos uploaded onto the system - I received a notification this was set up and sold on the dark web - the police are tracking these guys who stole my identity. Are you able to assist me please.  My mobile is <NUMBER>(I'm just in Surry Hills).  I'm going to keep this account open, I've changed the password and logged out others but can you provide any further information as to when this was set up, what was exactly done so I can track? I don't want anyone going through what I have or being scammed

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I really dislike this new set up. I want the ability to change back to the mobile style for my phone!
What do you need help with?: Hi! My coworker who set up her account accidentally put her email address incorrectly, and then locked herself out. She is our <NAME>. How do we fic?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please email me <EMAIL> to set up a zoom call. I need help navigating Canva. I want to make a green screen backdrop. Thanks.
How can we help you ?: Hi, I even subscribed in December and set up a team, but unfortunately I don’t see that now. I do not understand. Can you help me with what could have happened? Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’m being charged for a subscription i can’t see that I agreed to in my account settings. 

Please let me know how to resolve and unsubscribe.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I seem to have a number of teams attached to my account and I dont know where they have come from.  One of them I set up but the others I dont understand

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My branding colors and fonts do not apoear in the mobile app. I set them up from a computer but they are not syncing to my phone.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I set up a pro account, paid for the year in advance... now all my logo and brand settings are GONE???

What do you need help with?: The person michelle james set up this account with my e-mail address.  this is not me.  My information has been breeched and she is trying to use my CC information and e-mail to make purchases through your site.  I have filed a report on this issue.

Please remove this account as it is not valid

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, we're a business and I included our VAT ID in my account settings. Why do you still charge VAT? It's not needed. How to prevent that?

Thanks!

What do you need help with?: Someone set this account up with my e-mail address.
I am not michelle James

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My students are using canva and we are having issues with Google sign in if the iPad has already had a Canva account created with another user.  When students click on "logout", then click on sign up, they enter their email addresses, and before they can enter their passwords, they are sent directly to the account of another user of Canva.  It is impossible for them to set up an account.  Please assist. I have videoed the issue if you want to see what happens.
Thanks
Leslie HENRY

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I want to pause my pro plan and don't need the team option, so I want to cancel that. 
Please let me know what I need to do cause there doesn't seem to be a way to do this, or it's purposefully confusing or obtuse in the account settings.
Tanks!
What kind of problem are you reporting ?: Other Describe the problem: I set up an account and did not receive a confirmation e-mail in my e-mail.

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: My trial started today, only the account settings say that my account is not yet confirmed. If I then press "resend confirmation email" I will not receive anything. Please help.
What do you need help with?: I'm confused about the way my Canva is set up

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to cancel my subscription to canva. When I go into my account settings I am told I can't.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cant set a size for my page

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, i work for Johns Hopkins FCU and we use this program. We are interested in setting up a team and having everyone on one platform. We also need a contact for our due diligence. Please advise.

What do you need help with?: Hello! I recently purchased an HP Tango printer that had a 3-month free Canva Pro account advertised included. However I’ve never received any information about setting that up. 
Please advise.
Thank you! 
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I see no place where I have any paid account set up however I did receive a charge. How do I get this reversed?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: how to set a size

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: i want to buy two sets of stickers together and get express shipping for both not pay separate shipping

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello! My Canva payment is set to process tomorrow and I'm hoping I can pause this until I am paid this Friday, Jan. 29th, <NUMBER>Please let me know if this is possible - thanks so much! 

-Mina Soto

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Is Canva set up for 508 compliance?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

I was wondering how to browse/search for matching sets of templates. Right now, I'm having to find a random template, search for the name of that template, and then view the matching set. 

Is there an easier way to browse matching sets?

Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue:  I do not recall setting this up! How do I delete it??

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I purchased an HP Envy insta print printer and was supposed to get three months free of Canva Pro. How do I go about setting this up in Canva? 
Thanks, Judi Petersen <EMAIL>
